sentences.en: ...organizations set up as a counterbalance to groups allied to the ANC.
sentences.cn: ...作为对与非洲人国民大会联盟团体制衡而成立的各种组织。

sentences.en: Add honey to counterbalance the acidity.
By this electric repulsion and attraction he was able to counterbalance the influence of gravity.
sentences.cn: 通过这种电的排斥和吸引,他能够将重力的影响抵销.

sentences.en: He took two day off to counterbalance the overtime the week before.
sentences.cn: 他休了两天假以抵消前星期加的班.

sentences.en: In the contrary situation, they do not entirely invalidate or counterbalance the particular accidental determination.
sentences.cn: 反之, 这一特殊非主要决定因素并不完全无效或被抵消.

sentences.en: It produces different amplitudes by adjusting eccentric counterbalance to adapt to different processing requirements.
sentences.cn: 通过调整偏心配重,产生不同的振幅,以适应不同的工艺要求.

sentences.en: Males and females within our species rotated their fields in counterbalance to one another.
sentences.cn: 我们物种中的雌雄以相反方式旋转能量场.

sentences.en: Riskier investments tend to be counterbalanced by high rewards.
sentences.cn: 较高风险的投资往往报以高回报。

sentences.en: The hypothetical electron smeart must exert a net attractive Hellmann - Feynman force to counterbalance the internuclear repulsion.
sentences.cn: 假设的电子弥散必须提供净赫尔曼吸引力以抵消核间排斥力.

sentences.en: The irrational distribution of crankshaft counterbalance weight causes greater vibration.
sentences.cn: 曲轴平衡块质量分布不合理,会引起发动机振动大.

sentences.en: The paper discusses counterbalance of poles and zeros, main poles and zeros, and system types.
sentences.cn: 讨论了零极点相消问题 、 主导零极点问题和系统类型问题, 并且谈了作者自己的见解.

sentences.en: The two weights counterbalance each other.
There are, of course , drawbacks to counterbalance the advantages.
sentences.cn: 这就需要平衡各种利弊.

sentences.en: This explicit exception for free software would counterbalance the effective exception for proprietary software.
sentences.cn: 这个对自由软件的明显的例外可以制衡对专有软件的有效例外.

sentences.en: This machine uses the air operated coupling brake, uses the air counterbalance cylinder.
sentences.cn: 该机采用气动离合器制动器, 采用气动平衡缸.

sentences.en: You can counterbalance the amount of salt lost in sweat with sufficient salt in your diet.
sentences.cn: 你可以在饮食中摄取充足的盐以相互平衡排汗所流失的盐分.

sentences.en: You need to counterbalance the design and color with neutral shades for the furniture.
sentences.cn: 展位内家具需要用中性色调来平衡设计和颜色.

words.tran_cn: 平衡；对重平衡；补偿；均衡化

trans.tran_en: Something that is a counterbalance to something else counterbalances that thing
to have an equal and opposite effect to something such as a change, feeling etc
to have an equal and opposite effect to something such as a change, feeling etc
